items.english: An eye for an eye, no mercy given.
Not ready when it's time to go.
True love can't be cut off, even with a knife.

items.explanation: 以婴儿吸奶的坐势喻十拿九稳。
items.english: Like a baby nursing—safe and steady.

items.explanation: 吹牛遇到知道事实真相的。
items.english: Caught bragging in front of someone who knows the truth.

items.explanation: 英雄难过美人关，怕老婆。
items.english: Brave in life and death, but fears his wife.

items.explanation: 新娘过门没几天就打回原形。
items.english: Like a bride turning back to her true self in just 3 days.
A girl grows and changes eighteen times.
Flowers don’t bloom wrongly, and people don’t meet wrongly—it's fate.

items.teochew: 富人富千金，穷人穷寸铁
items.english: The rich own treasures, the poor barely a scrap.
Not dead, but badly wrecked.

items.teochew: 一人做工课，百人担浪话
items.explanation: 光说不做的人倒是没有缺点。
items.english: One works, a hundred gossip.
Pitch-dark sky and earth.
When going out, don’t expect summer weather.
Fixing symptoms without treating the cause.
Saw something you shouldn’t have.
Three parts acting, seven parts being a good person.
Clueless and unaware of the situation.
Not dead yet but still acting like a child.

items.teochew: 后生风流过度，食老无能行路
items.english: Spent all your energy in youth, now can't walk in old age.
What a shameful person!
The seven daily essentials: firewood, rice, oil, salt, sauce, vinegar, and tea.

items.explanation: 不帮忙理家务就知道吃饭。
items.english: Only good at sitting and eating, not helping out.
Scaring someone half to death.
Putting on airs and pretending.
This year's sweet potatoes aren't like last year's taro—times have changed.

items.teochew: 咸菜菜脯是我命，见着鱼肉命住勿
items.english: Pickled veggies are my life, but I still long for fish and meat—always aiming higher.

items.teochew: 入门看人意，破柴看柴势
items.explanation: 经验之谈，要先进行了解。
items.english: Before entering, watch the mood; before splitting wood, read the grain—know before you act.
The cat meows its own name—like the thief yelling 'catch the thief'.
The one nitpicking is the one most likely to buy.

items.explanation: 多以此比喻单相思或自以为是。
items.english: Turnip cake warm on one side—unrequited love or self-delusion.

items.teochew: 龟笑鳖无毛，蟹笑蛴无膏
items.english: The turtle mocks the softshell for having no hair; the crab mocks the grub for having no fat—pot calling kettle black.

items.explanation: 像老鼠嫁女儿一样，声音不大。
items.english: Mouse marrying off her daughter—quiet and subtle fuss.

items.explanation: 传统说法，七月九月生的婴儿能活，八月难养。
items.english: Born in seven lives, eight dies, nine thrives—old belief about baby survival.

items.explanation: 没有吃饱，开玩笑说成是碗筷吃不下。
items.english: It's not me—it’s the bowl and chopsticks that can’t eat.

items.teochew: 所担无好话，所做无雅粿
items.explanation: 不会做事，说错话、做错事。
items.english: No good words in what they say, no fine cake in what they do—always messing up.

items.teochew: 看戏遇着人团圆，听古遇着人派钱
items.explanation: 运气不好，总是赶不上好时机。
items.english: Watching drama hits the ending, listening to tales hits the tipping point—always a step too late.
Eyes but no tears—want to cry but can't, self-inflicted sorrow.

items.explanation: 为求心安，行善弥补过错。
items.english: Eating vegetarian to cover up evil—trying to make peace with one's conscience.

items.teochew: 食哩抢头前，做哩退后畔
items.english: First to grab food, last to step up and work.
Stole a bite and forgot to wipe your mouth—left clear evidence.

items.teochew: 人身猪哥头，赶人赴彩楼
items.explanation: 没自知之明，还想追求美女。
items.english: Pig-faced man dreaming of a beauty—no self-awareness.
Doing odd jobs barely earns enough to eat.

items.explanation: 嫁人要嫁人品，不是财富。
items.english: Marry the man, not the farmland—character over riches.
If you love a woman, be ready to toil for her.

items.explanation: 卖力不讨好还不如不做。
items.english: Work hard without gain—worse than being lazy.

items.teochew: 亚官穷 亚鬼死 亚伙头食少米
items.english: Don’t fight with officials, ghosts, or cooks—you’ll always lose.

items.teochew: 十二菜桌人食，腰屎沟水人荡嘴
items.english: A feast turns foul—ending in mess and regret.
Like stir-fried noodles—completely chaotic.
Thicker-skinned than a street stone—shameless.

items.teochew: 乌乌是字 白白是纸 我唔北依 依唔北我
items.english: Black marks are words, white is paper—but I don't know it, and it doesn't know me.

items.teochew: 衫破正是衣，亩死正是妻
items.english: Only when the shirt is torn is it truly a shirt; only when the wife is gone is she truly cherished.

items.explanation: 封神榜人物，用来形容老、丑且恶毒的妇女。
items.english: Guī Líng Shèngmǔ—used to describe an old, ugly, and vicious woman.
Wants lean, fatty, and layered meat—greedy for all.

items.explanation: 传说家猫单生是幸运之兆，有钱建房。
items.english: A lone cat brings wealth—enough to build a house.

items.explanation: 肠子粘连在一起，形容非常饥饿。
items.english: So hungry your intestines are sticking together.

items.teochew: 有铺无蚊帐，乞蚊咬到唏厦叫
items.english: There’s a bed but no net—mosquitoes bite till you scream.

items.explanation: 以芋泥慢冷喻暗热烫人。
items.english: No steam, no smoke, yet scalds the throat—quiet danger.

items.explanation: 天气热，水果多；也喻成熟或变色。
items.english: On Qixi Festival, the sky darkens, longan ripens—heat brings fruit and change.
No loyal kin, but close with outsiders—betrayal at home.

items.teochew: 烧骂无好话，烧拍无好槌
items.english: Fired-up curses aren't nice, and angry blows don't hold back.
Hits others but cries like the victim.
When it’s time, ride that flag—go with the flow.
Even if the tea is weak, the affection is strong.
With cash to burn, no husband left—money loses value.

items.explanation: 以火烧赤壁的典故喻英雄所见相同。
items.english: Writes 'fire' on the palm—great minds think alike.
If bean paste has no worms, then there’s no one in the world—some things are just natural.

items.explanation: 喻贤人先当兵后当将，或能者慢登场。
items.english: Soldiers go first, generals come later—ability rises in time.

items.explanation: 不能放松警惕，或用作吵架时的狠话。
items.english: A lash in the eye will wake you up—stay alert or be warned.
Has no house to live in, but builds one for others—overextending beyond your means.

items.teochew: 哙圈猪，卖喷火，哙梭圆，卖烙粿
items.english: Raising pigs but selling fire; making sieves but selling cakes—working yourself silly.

items.teochew: 苏秦不第有三叔，蒙正后科无此人
items.english: Help should come before the exam, not after it’s too late.
Asking for help is like swallowing a three-foot sword—painful and hard.

items.teochew: 你我伊，老厝边，我拍你，你拍伊
items.english: You, me, and them—neighbors passing the blame down the line.

items.teochew: 有钱无块使，买龟放落海
items.english: Got money but no idea how to use it—like buying turtles just to release them.

items.explanation: 有人知道缘由，有人盲目附和。
items.english: Some laugh knowingly, some laugh along cluelessly.
Break your own jug, and end up with no wine—share too much, lose out.
Bold to eat, timid to die—greedy but scared.
Red-faced like a sacrificial pig on display—too much makeup.

items.teochew: 和尚嘴体体，唔是爱钱住是爱米
items.english: Monk grinning politely—not for money, maybe for rice—someone’s up to something.
Arrogant beyond Wang Mang—extremely overbearing.
Quit your job and live off the old rice—retire on savings.
Late January sweet potatoes are sweeter than rice cakes.
Poke the rice bug for no reason—asking for trouble.

items.explanation: 对人对事不公正，偏心眼。
items.english: The lord of Anbu plays favorites—blatant bias.

items.explanation: 办婚事违背老人意愿时的无奈话语。
items.english: Don't know the rules, just scatter—reluctantly let go.
Worse than a horseshoe crab’s mate—ungrateful and disloyal.
Want goose turned to porridge—wishful thinking.
Good words sour after three ears—gossip distorts truth.
A face darker than rags—full of reluctance.
Have money but won’t spend—stingy to the bone.
Tougher than a jade vase—fierce and sharp-tongued woman.
Good intentions invite thunder—kindness punished.

items.teochew: 有花当面插，有话当面担
items.english: Stick flowers to the face, speak truth to the face.
Mouth never stops—always talking or eating.
Big mouth; says things that shouldn't be said.

items.explanation: 事情传遍或走南闯北见多识广。
items.english: Gong echoes to thirteen provinces—well-known or widely traveled.
Pour three bushels of sesame, not a seed enters the ear—deaf to advice.

items.teochew: 狐狸迈笑猫，脚仓平平饶
items.english: Fox mocks the cat—same lame feet.
Everyone minds their own line—self-focused.
Salty is savory, sweet is tasty—each has its charm.
When the time comes, flowers bloom—patience pays off.

items.teochew: 到潮不到桥，白白走一场
items.english: Came for the tide but missed the bridge—wasted the trip.
Sit where it’s cool—stay out of the way.
A broken drum saves the moon—unexpected value.
June peaches—money can’t always buy what you want.
Didn’t eat but pretends to pick teeth—fake pride.
Three-pound cat chases four-pound rat—overreaching.
Talks like a salesman—don't trust too easily.
Big tongue babbles—can’t get to the point.
Eager ears twist family words—misunderstood and unfair.

items.explanation: 形容一个人不讲理到世上再找不到跟他类似的
items.english: So unreasonable that no match can be found in the market.

items.explanation: 指有的人很好面子，很重面子
items.english: So obsessed with saving face, it’s as if they'd rather die.

items.teochew: 肚饱猪脚柴柴，肚困番薯胶胶
items.explanation: 不同条件下对外物的要求不一样
items.english: Full stomach wants tender pork, hungry belly accepts sticky sweet potato.

items.explanation: 即便是鱼儿一样小，也有自尊心
items.english: Even the smallest blackfish has dignity.

items.explanation: 指嗓门大，也指有些人不好沟通，动辄大吵大闹
items.english: A hundred throats shouting—loud and hard to deal with.

items.teochew: 八仙过海，赚无个钱来使
items.english: All showing their powers, but earn no coin—too many opinions, no results.
Speaking in loud and soft tones—dramatic and expressive.

items.teochew: 未吃五月节粽，破裘唔甘放
items.explanation: 端午前天气未稳，不能脱棉衣
items.english: Before eating Dragon Boat dumplings, the winter coat stays.

items.explanation: 再怎么积极也当不上一把手
items.english: Even if you jump yourself to death, you'll never sit in the boss's chair.
Visiting with only your two arms—empty-handed courtesy.

items.explanation: 不计较制作过程，只管享受
items.english: Out of sight, down it goes—ignorance is bliss.

items.teochew: 有嘴担北人，无嘴担胶已
items.explanation: 对别人宽容，对自己严苛
items.english: With a mouth, blame others; without one, blame yourself.

items.explanation: 早发未必长久，喻人情冷暖
items.english: Early sun doesn’t last the day—early success may fade.
Offering toilet leftovers to the teacher—fake courtesy.
Food can be shared, but not careless words.

items.teochew: 做一日洗被，免百日洗脚
items.english: Wash a quilt once to avoid washing your feet for 100 days.
So hot even your skin can’t bear it.

items.teochew: 天生人唔平，有人无齿有人重牙
items.english: Life’s not fair—some toothless, some with strong jaws.
Even vegetarians enjoy sea shrimp.
Crooked bamboo breeds no fine shoots.
Yixi lard cake—big and thick, like a good opportunity.
Don’t fake concern—mind your own business.

items.teochew: 北人亩看困肚，北人安看了工
items.english: Don’t worry over others’ hunger or work—you’re not them.
Pickles and wine—simple ties last longer.
Carrying a stone mill round and round—foolish and inefficient.
A good dog doesn’t block the road.

items.teochew: 世情看唔破，硬虎着交挂
items.english: Can’t see through the world’s ways—rashness leads to harm.
Hot glutinous balls, cold rice dumplings—each food has its way.

items.teochew: 同年同月同日生，有人做官有人卡更
items.english: Born the same day, but fates diverge—some lead, some guard.
In-laws host all night—too much kindness becomes a burden.

items.explanation: 比喻妻子的主意比丈夫好。
items.english: The wife's ideas are wiser than the husband's.

items.teochew: 白虎爱吃甜，三煞爱吃咸
items.english: White Tiger likes sweet, Three Fiends like salty—everyone has different tastes.
Spend freely without care—big spender.

items.explanation: 比喻放弃已有利益去抢别的，结果一无所获。
items.english: Give up a peach to chase a biscuit—end up with nothing.

items.teochew: 胀猪肥，胀狗瘦，胀人如纸简
items.explanation: 吃饭要节制，不可暴饮暴食。
items.english: Pigs get fat when stuffed, dogs get thin, people become like paper—moderation in eating.
Pig’s mouth is round, duck’s is flat—different voices, no consensus.

items.explanation: 形容做事没人知，得不到回报。
items.english: Work like a tiger or ghost, yet no one knows—no recognition.
A water ghost becomes a city god—sudden rise in status.

items.explanation: 思想自由，也指异想天开。
items.english: Think what you want, no one taxes thoughts—free to imagine.

items.explanation: 不要做坏事以免被揭发。
items.english: Don't ask to be painted on the lantern—avoid public shame.
The tide roars but people have gone—missed opportunity.
Catch the turtle, lose the softshell—never get both.
Like a craftsman putting powder on a donkey—wasted effort.
As easy as drinking a bowl of water.
Eats so much, even follows the moon.

items.teochew: 三人五目，日后勿呾长短脚话
items.english: Three men, five eyes—no complaints after agreement.
The fate officer reports directly—tells on others.
Thick-skinned now, blessings come later.

items.explanation: 说话掺杂方言与普通话。
items.english: Harbor water—half salty, half fresh—mixed language.

items.teochew: 七脚马龙骑,八脚马鬼爷
items.explanation: 形容两种大蜘蛛的不同。
items.english: Seven-legged for kings, eight-legged for ghosts—different spider kinds.
Cat and mouse hearts—love to eat, love to hoard.
Trying to fly before learning to walk.
From Siamese leather to pig trough—rambling talk.
Earth god didn’t eat but got stomach ache—unfair punishment.

items.explanation: 批评言过其实、自高自大。
items.english: Carry oranges, eat and return leftovers—boastful talk.

items.teochew: 双脚哩弯弯，一人惨一桩
items.english: Bent legs, bent fate—everyone suffers something.

items.explanation: 误解导致后果，悔之晚矣。
items.english: A mistaken fire burns the tail—too late for regret.

items.explanation: 人在紧急情况下往往因考虑不周，做出不合时宜的决定。
items.english: In a moment of confusion, trying to drag a cow upstairs—poor judgment under pressure.

items.teochew: 一物甲一药，胶走无烂掠卖着
items.explanation: 一物降一物，各有所克制。
items.english: Every cure fits a poison—everything has its match.
More bitter than pig’s bile.
Watch for thieves one night, they strike another—never-ending vigilance.

items.teochew: 屁是肚内烟，唔放误了身，放屁是君子，笑屁是小人
items.explanation: 自然的事没必要羞耻，讥笑反倒小人。
items.english: Better to release than suffer—laughing at it makes you the fool.

items.explanation: 侥幸得到好处或意外成功。
items.english: Stumbled into luck like picking up warm pig dung.
By the time it’s learned, the glue has dried—missed timing.
In a new village, follow its customs; in a harbor, follow its curve.

items.explanation: 讽刺那些危言耸听或夸大其词的人。
items.english: Old auntie’s broken mouth—spouting nonsense.

items.teochew: 陈三五娘相娶走，扮掉益春在半山
items.english: Chen eloped with the bride, dumped the maid halfway—betrayal after help.

items.teochew: 生人易过日，死人易过七
items.explanation: 日子过得飞快，尤其忙碌时。
items.english: Days fly for the living, sevens pass for the dead.

items.explanation: 说话模棱两可，总不会错。
items.english: The blind boy tells fortune—always vague but safe.

items.teochew: 食三两菜脯住爱上西天
items.english: A few pickled veggies and dreaming of heaven—ambition beyond reach.
A vicious tongue cuts deep.

items.explanation: 留下证据让人无法抵赖。
items.english: People fear written words, cows fear nose rings—proof holds power.

items.explanation: 经历过才懂他人的痛苦。
items.english: Only a toothache knows another’s pain.

items.explanation: 动荡时期，有人因祸得福。
items.english: From troubled years, riches arise.

items.teochew: 人家食物配，人少做工课
items.explanation: 人少时更该尽力，不可推诿。
items.english: Fewer hands, more work—no shirking allowed.

items.explanation: 形容吃相难看，狼吞虎咽。
items.english: Carrying straw into the gate—eating like a beast.

items.teochew: 二拍一，项生绿；大拍细，项生计
items.english: Wrong match makes sores—poor fit brings harm.
Money makes a wife, wine makes a brother.

items.explanation: 做了坏事还装模作样掩盖。
items.english: Climbing the ladder but can’t see the ledger—covering guilt.
Quieter than night.

items.explanation: 春天始于东风，冬天终于北风。
items.english: East wind starts the year, north wind ends it.

items.explanation: 年轻爱打扮，年老讲究吃。
items.english: Youth loves style, elders love taste.
The scholar without pants—books over basics.
Pick too long, eyes get dizzy.

items.explanation: 适度变通比一味强硬更有效。
items.english: A curve can be stronger than a straight arrow.
Mid-season dressing—neither winter nor spring.

items.explanation: 形容太累了，眼睛都睁不开。
items.english: Eyes like a tired donkey—completely worn out.

items.teochew: 有钱买蚊香，无钱买蚊帐
items.explanation: 小钱不停花，大钱不肯出。
items.english: Money for incense, none for the net—penny wise, pound foolish.
Midnight melon—unexpected relapse.

items.teochew: 好哩观音样，孬哩螳螂像
items.english: As kind as Guanyin, as fierce as a mantis.
Old and blunt—speak plainly.

items.teochew: 好死在大成树下，孬死在黄刺茹下
items.explanation: 落叶归根，死在故乡比异地强。
items.english: Better to die under the hometown tree than in foreign thorns.

items.teochew: 禾埠出土时，姿娘迎嫁年
items.explanation: 男人要出生时日好，女人要结婚时日好。
items.english: A man needs a lucky birth hour, a woman a lucky wedding day.

items.explanation: 吓得腿发软不能行走，用爬但还爬错了方向。
items.english: So scared you crawl the wrong way.

items.teochew: 谷鸡姨无巢，欲生卵，甜甜哭
items.english: Like a frog without a nest, crying sweetly while laying eggs.

items.teochew: 兄担兄精，弟担弟能，兄罗当虎，弟罗掠龙
items.explanation: 用于比喻都不中用而且好说大话。
items.english: One brother boasts like a tiger, the other massages like a dragon—both useless.

items.explanation: 嘴上说好话，背后下毒手。
items.english: Sweet words, backstab with a sickle.

items.explanation: 形容一个人不讲理，在世界上找不到像他这样的人。
items.english: So unreasonable, no match in the world.

items.teochew: 九月狗含日，无用姿娘理唔直
items.explanation: 比喻主妇动作慢，做事不利索。
items.english: A dog in September still chasing the sun—too slow to finish anything.

items.explanation: 因养出内奸而遭受损失。
items.english: Raise a cat, the mouse bites the bag.
Secretly joyful but afraid to smile.
An old monkey has no new tricks.

items.explanation: 只会说不会干，或者乱干。
items.english: All talk, no action—head lice fill the basket.

items.teochew: 跍哩跍三年，枭哩枭一时
items.explanation: 错误被接受多年，正确却一时不容。
items.english: A wrong squats three years, a right chased in an hour.

items.explanation: 意外的好运，碰巧的收获。
items.english: Even a cursed ghost strikes gold with a hoe.

items.explanation: 勤劳致富，不需伤心流泪。
items.english: The hardworking shed less tears.
A stranger to the place and the faces.

items.teochew: 各人各人尚，青盲买手电
items.english: To each their own—the blind buys a flashlight.
Small numbers fear the abacus.
Pale face, pale mouth—no pulse in the palm.
Celery and garlic—eat, then store your wealth.
No tea shared, no wine owed—no friendship.
Turtle round, softshell flat, crab headless—every shape is unique.
A tiger’s head, an iron nail’s tail.
Cat-and-mouse guts—eats and hoards all at once.

items.teochew: 青竹梅唔过四月八，洋梅唔过五月节
items.english: Green plum by April 8, imported by May Fest.
A short-lived child’s temper.
Neck veins thicker than chopsticks.
Three bushels vanish in one corner of the belly.

items.teochew: 饲虫饲鸟家伙了，饲猪饲牛家伙浮
items.explanation: 玩物丧志与实用致富的对比。
items.english: Feed bugs, go broke; feed pigs, get rich.

items.explanation: 坐月子吃最好，嫁人穿最好。
items.english: Best food for new moms, best clothes for brides.

items.teochew: 阿姆合阿伯，百货合百客
items.english: Aunt matches uncle; goods match buyers.

items.teochew: 过了七月半，日头短条线
items.english: Past mid-July, daylight shortens.

items.teochew: 鸡囝啄米碎，力啄一鸡胃
items.english: Chick pecks crumbs—fills a belly.
A snoring pig grows big; a snoring man travels well.

items.teochew: 秋瓜唔牵唔上棚，大船无桨就孬撑
items.english: No pull, no shelf; no oar, no sail.

items.teochew: 后生赚钱囝儿使，食老久积无人睬
items.english: Youth earns, kids spend; aged ignored with savings.
Grass carp’s head, carp’s throat—local delicacies.
Grass cakes boil; weather shifts fast.
Frost is water, Yama is ghost—know the essence.

items.teochew: 摸到须头滑，滴无墨汁出
items.english: Touch the mustache, smooth but no ink comes.
Seven sits, eight crawls, nine grows teeth.
Spare when plenty, use when tight.

items.teochew: 笑死程咬金，哭死程铁牛
items.english: Laugh killed Cheng Yaojin, cry killed Cheng Iron Ox.

items.explanation: 说得天花乱坠，令人信服。
items.english: Talks like petals stacking on stamens—brilliant talker.
